Sentencas: The direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell is a potential technology that efficiently and cleanly converts the chemical energy of solid carbon into electricity.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: Its superiority of all-solid-state configuration and unique operating mechanism indicate that it has a good application prospect in high energy density portable or backup power supplys.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: It can also be used to convert coal into electrical power.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: Here, for the first time, we report a compact direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack with 12 cells fabricated on a single 10 x 10 cm electrolyte plate.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: The plate covers a container filled with solid carbon-rich fuel to form a stack.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: No sealant and pipelines are needed and the carbon-rich fuel can be reloaded.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: Both activated carbon and sawdust of bauhinia tree branch are used as the fuel.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: The output power of such a stack approaches more than 10 W at 800 degrees C. Using 15 g of 5 wt% Fe-loaded activated carbon as the fuel, a stack discharging at a constant current of 1.5 A outputs an energy of 29 Wh, correspongding to an energy desnity of carbon of similar to 2000 Wh kg(-1).
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: This work shows the feasibility of developing direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell into a compact electricity generator using readily available carbon-rich fuels.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application

Sentencas: It also shows promise of using this technology in clean and efficient conversion of coal to electricity.
Titulo: A compact and seal-less direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack stepping into practical application
